Sobhita Elder’s Birth Story
“The Victor named Padumuttara,
the world’s most senior, bull among men,🔽taught the deathless state
to a great crowd of people.

I raised my hands in respectful salutation
and was one-pointed at that time.

Having established the method of the Dhamma,
the Buddha, the compassionate sage,
while sitting in the Community of monks,

analyzed: imāḥ gāthāḥ abhāsatha  yaḥ saḥ ñāṇam pakittesi

‘Whoever has faith in the Buddha, the leader of the world,
for a hundred thousand eons
will not go to a bad destination.
Having burned up the defilements,

will be a disciple of the Teacher named Sobhita.’
For five thousand eons
they were famous and fortunate,
endowed with the seven treasures,
and a powerful Universal Monarch.
My defilements are burned away,
all my existences are destroyed;
The three knowledges have been attained,
and the Buddha’s instruction has been done.
The four analytical insights,
and the eight liberations,
the six super-knowledges have been realized,
